name: Froggers Adventures: The Rescue
summary: Frogger's Adventures: The Rescue, known in Japan as Frogger Rescue (フロッガーレスキュー Furoggā Resukyū?), is an action-adventure video game released in 2003 by Konami HWI. It is based on the original 1981 Frogger arcade game, and contains similar hop-and-dodge style gameplay.
